item.title: Trump says he won't take Greenland by force as allies push back at Davos
item.description: President Trump told world leaders, CEOs and policymakers at the Davos economic forum that he wouldn't use force to take control of Greenland.

item.title: South braces for winter storm this weekend: Latest forecast
item.description: More than 30 million in the South are under a winter storm watch this weekend, from Texas to Tennessee.

item.title: Legal battles over immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota intensify
item.description: Confrontations with federal officers over their massive immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota are showing no signs of stopping.
